title: Data Theft L1 – File upload – SWG Audit
description: Data theft simulation: file upload types. Upload allowed = perimeter may have failed. Blocked = passed. Max 1 KB.
keywords: SWG Audit, data theft test, file upload, perimeter security
headline: Data Theft – Level 1: File upload types
subline: Upload allowed = perimeter may have failed. Blocked = passed. Use a sample file or upload your own (max 1 KB). File deleted from the server after 10 minutes.
instructions: Configure the perimeter to allow this site. Security must block or inspect outbound file uploads. Upload succeeds = perimeter failed to intercept the upload.
feedbackFail: File upload succeeded = perimeter may have failed to block the upload.
feedbackPass: Upload blocked or failed = perimeter passed.
